original_title: เรื่องผีเล่า
overview: "Haunted Car" a young businessman with a lot of secrets on his way home in a taxi. It brings a horror story that reminds him of being alive "The Book of Truth" A thriller writer who received an email enigma about the legend of the leafy book. So he began writing his horror novels in the Bai Lan book before discovering fear beyond his imagination  "Reborn" A mysterious woman who comes to search for the most frightening story in a ghost hotel. She must try to survive. And free the evil spirits
title: Haunted Tales
